code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const getYoutubeThumbnail=url=>{const videoId=url.split('v=')[1]||url.split('youtu.be/')[1];const ampersandPosition=videoId?videoId.indexOf('&'):-1;return ampersandPosition!==-1?"https://img.youtube.com/vi/".concat(videoId.substring(0,ampersandPosition),"/hqdefault.jpg"):"https://img.youtube.com/vi/".concat(videoId,"/hqdefault.jpg");};const EduItem=_ref=>{let{title,desc,hashes,link}=_ref;const thumbnail=getYoutubeThumbnail(link);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"location_wrap",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"location",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tre_title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tre_desc",children:desc})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tre_hashes",children:hashes}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tre_img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:thumbnail,alt:title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tre_link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:link,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:link})})]});};export default EduItem;
